Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ employees
    + employees_last_modified_trigger (trigger)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

-- Transaction Group #1
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER employees_last_modified_trigger
    BEFORE UPDATE ON employees
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_last_modified();
